meta.title: Golden Retriever Anxiety: Symptoms, Causes & Solutions
meta.description: Do Golden Retrievers get anxiety? Learn about separation anxiety, noise phobias, and how to help your anxious Golden.

hero.title: Understanding Golden Retriever Anxiety
hero.subtitle: Why your happy-go-lucky dog might be stressed.

intro: While known for their friendly nature, Golden Retrievers are highly social dogs that can suffer from separation anxiety and noise phobias.
symptoms: Barking or whining when left alone
causes: Being left alone for long periods

solutions.title: Exercise
solutions.description: A tired dog is a calm dog. Ensure 60+ minutes of activity daily.

solutions.title: Crate Training
solutions.description: Create a safe space for your dog to retreat to.
